title: What are some really good books on legitimising political power, preferably on antiquity, but more general books are welcome as well? - Quora

response.answer_text: I would start with this anthropological work: How Chiefs Come to Power: The Political Economy in Prehistory: Earle, Timothy: 0884321988748: Amazon.com: Books It compares different times and different parts of the globe and is considered a classic in the field. It is looking at the economic side of power, primarily, and argues that chiefs have to control an inelastic resource.

"I Will Be King Over You!" the Rhetoric of Divine Kingship in the Book of Ezekiel von Terry R. Clark  Patrick Vinton Kirch How Chiefs Became Kings  Carol J. King Ancient Macedonia  James George Sir Frazer The Golden Bough
